column4: Greetings. After a clean install of Gutsy grub doesn't see my windows HD anymore. Is there a way to solve this?
Greetings. After a clean install of Gutsy grub doesn't see my windows HD anymore. Is there a way to solve this?
I have here something called ntfs-3g
Gnome here, but got it, hold on
then I just enable write support for internal device, right?
Yes, I believe it is. Sorry been a long time since I last accessed it... What if it is formatted as FAT32?
should I sudo apt-get install ntfs ? I have here ntfs-3g ... what is the difference between them?
